title: World faces a pandemic   Dan in Ottawa   Castanet net
description: World faces a pandemic   Dan in Ottawa Castanet net What does it mean when the WHO declares a pandemic  CTV News Canada has taken the right steps to tackle the pandemic  but it may soon have to do a lot more The Globe and Mail Coronavirus outbreak  Countries
content: It has been seven days since my report on the COVID   virus Since then  the World Health Organization  WHO  has declared that the virus outbreak is now a pandemic What does a pandemic virus mean A new virus is often described in threeways ul li    chars
